summary: This bill, the Rapid Expulsion of Migrant Offenders who Violate and Evade Act (REMOVE Act), aims to expedite the removal of certain aliens. It amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to require the Attorney General to commence removal proceedings as quickly as possible, particularly for aliens convicted of deportable offenses. The bill mandates that all immigration court proceedings for these individuals be completed within 15 days of commencement.
